name: The Grim Tree
description:
=Controls=
-WASD- to move 

- CTRL - To Attack, Sorry animations slower than actual attack.
-Q - Plant Current Seed

-E - Pull Plant

-F - Swap Equipped Item

-R - Talk To Demon

Sorry for the janky controls.

The Grim Tree was made for the Untitled Game Jame #09.

Simple Farming Sim, Kill humans as the grim reaper, they grow into trees, sometimes giving you a seed to grow, grow your own costumes are weapons. A simple farm sim.

Collect all 9 Costumes, and all 5 Weapons.

Careful though, they try and bite back!
